header.title: School Management System
header.shortDesc: We give the simple, powerful & affordable solution in the education system with SMS system

descriptions.description: A2A Digital gives the simple, powerful & affordable solution in the education system, we provide our school Management System solution that helps every school keep tracking their students' performance and attendance in one system. We remove the traditional way of using white paper based into a School Management System along with our technology. Our concepts are : School management software; Parent teacher collaboration; Fee management and online payment; Time table, attendance & scheduling; Gradebook & reports; Online examination and assignment; Courses and Batches; Human Resources; Customisable Dashboards; Student Admission; User Management; Institute/Event Calendar; Finance; Student Information; Student/Parent Login; Employee/Teacher Login; Report Center; ID Card Generation; and Certification Generating
